title: i just saw an american get scammed on livestream
body:
so dougdoug had to order a pizza because of his chat.
the chat voted on what will be on the pizza.

this is a 
small gluten free no cheese well done pizza with extra ranch, olives, jalapenios, salami.
and he payed a total of 30$ for this.
FOR THIS LITTLE SHIT that has NO CHEESE.

just yesterday i saw american ads "buy 5 for 4$ now" and then i see this. this is the biggest scma i've ever witnessed "in person" in my entire life.

how can something this tiny be sold IN AMERICA.
the place of the big tasty food.
and he ordered at a big company. im not gonna nameshame but damn. 
man im starting 2020 off strong lol.
